• Individual counselling increased EBF during the neonatal period (OR=3.45; 15 studies) and at 6 
months of age (OR=1.93; 9 studies). 
• Mass media increased EBF at 1 month of age from 48–70%, at 4 months of age from 24–31%, and at 
6 months of age from 7–12 % in exposed population (1 study).
Cochrane Review Support to breastfeeding mothers (Review) concluded  (14):
